review: It works fine, not great. I have to unplug it from time-to-time to get it to work. I haven't been able to get either my Samsung tablet or my iPad to recognize it, which is upsetting.
author: Sandra Kolbo

review: Best $39 I have spent in long time. Simple to install, even easier to use.  Well designed product!!
author: philip c fluke

review: It does exactly what it said it would to
author: Phyllis Shaitelman

review: I am going to return the fire stick. It keeps cutting off to browse. It keeps getting worse. We can barely get through one program without having to restart.
author: Nora Winfrey

review: Easy install and set up, it works great, I don't think we'll ever be returning to cable again. :)
author: fiesty_amazon

review: We are not tech savvy and it was easy to install.  We love it.  It had open up so many new programs for us.  We are thinking about buying another one for additional tics in our home.
author: Amber M.

review: Just getting started, may be a five but we will see
author: John Willoughby
